page.title: 19FARMING IN OUR AREA 3
page.content: WOBAGE FARM.The owner of Wobage farm is Mr.Cason. The farm is now a pottery and they do not grow crops.They have 2 pick ups and 2 cars. 3 people work at the pottery but there are sometimes 4. Mr and Mrs Jones own Phocle Farm at Phocle Green.Phocle Farm is a mixed farm,arable with 130 cattle and 130 sheep.Mr Jones grows potatoes,sugar beet and corn.Four people work on his 300 acres of land.To work his land he has 4 tractors,1 combine,1 baler,1 lorry,3 ploughs,3 trailers,1 spreader and 1 sprayer. Mr Jones has 2 tractors, 1 combine, 3 balers, 1 lorry,2 plough,1 trailer, 1 spreader and 1 sprayer.5 people work on the farm. Mr Jones owns Gayton farm with a partner.
